= SET _key_ _value_ =
_Time complexity: O(1)_

 Set the string _value_ as value of the _key_.
 The string can't be longer than 1073741824 bytes (1 GB).

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Status code reply]

== See also ==
 * [SetnxCommand SETNX] is like SET but don't perform the operation if the target key already exists.
